Summary: It visits every night for past 6-months since I moved into this new place. Have Video & Pic's. 2-other crafts have started showing up behind it. All look identical.
divs: sighting detailssame ufo decends rapidly\steady pace every night at about 7:15 pm and stays until about 8:30 pm. comes down to tree tops, takes same path for past 6-months ever since i moved into this new place (i.m secluded out in the country). it likes changing shapes and making shapes\pic's in the sky (it even wrote my first name in sky). sent pic's to my sister of it. she's amazed and thinks i need to contact real investigator. so, here i am, trying to find someone. recently 2-more of same shape have followed behind first one but at a further distance. i have taken many pic's w\camera and used up couple of 8mm tapes with camcorder. no joke, this is for real!!
